snippet: The Bogotá mayor, Gustavo Petro, was said to have made serious mistakes in his handling of the botched transfer of garbage collection from private contractors to a government-run service.
abstract: Inspector general of Colombia orders Bogota Mayor Gustavo Petro to be removed from office, saying he made serious mistakes in his handling of the botched transfer of garbage collection from private contractors to a government-run service.

byline.contributor: Susan Abad contributed reporting from Bogotá, Colombia.

lead_paragraph: The Bogotá mayor, Gustavo Petro, was said to have made serious mistakes in his handling of the botched transfer of garbage collection from private contractors to a government-run service.

headline.main: Mayor Ousted in Colombia After Claims of Bungling
headline.print_headline: Mayor Ousted In Colombia After Claims Of Bungling
